scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean; npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy_nft:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_nft.js
scripts.deploy_nft:goerli: NETWORK=goerli npx hardhat run --network goerli scripts/deploy_nft.js
scripts.deploy_sm:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_xtoken.js
scripts.deploy_sm:goerli: NETWORK=goerli npx hardhat run --network goerli scripts/deploy_xtoken.js

scripts.deploy_rf:goerli: NETWORK=goerli npx hardhat run --network goerli scripts/deploy_rf.js

scripts.deploy_gp:goerli: NETWORK=goerli npx hardhat run --network goerli scripts/deploy_gp.js

scripts.deploy_xrouter:goerli: NETWORK=goerli npx hardhat run --network goerli scripts/deploy_xrouter.js

scripts.deploy_ctoken:goerli: NETWORK=goerli npx hardhat run --network goerli scripts/deploy_ctoken.js
